title: U3 vs EPR
author: VD
content_html: It’s not the 8.3% U3 that matters, but rather the 58.4% EPR, which is down 0.2% from last month. That means unemployment is still rising as a percentage of the population, regardless of the number of new jobs reported.
content_text: It’s not the 8.3% U3 that matters, but rather the 58.4% EPR, which is down 0.2% from last month.  That means unemployment is still rising as a percentage of the population, regardless of the number of new jobs reported.
